ygData.subject: Jewelcrafting - my results with skill level 18
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw no change in prices from level 18 to level 22. Here are my results so far with a charisma of around 110 (I m at work can t remember exactly): Practiced
ygData.messageBody:
I saw no change in prices from level 18 to level 22.
Here are my results so far with a charisma of around 110 (I'm at work
can't remember exactly):
Practiced to level 18.
17 cost a couple coppers
18 cost like 9 coppers
bought again at 20 which cost 1 silver
21 cost 1s 3c

so, BUY UP TO 21 it is soooooo much cheaper than failing. 21 is the max
I could buy by the way even though I have more points to spend.

At 18 Malachite was trivial for me. I have settled on using Jasper.
I've failed with it twice but been successful 8/10 times.

Here's the kicker, when I add up the cost of buying materials vs.
selling I am losing a couple of coppers. Can you believe that? High
charisma is awesome.

Here's a page I put up to talk about EQ things. Just two links so far,
a page of shots of a griffin getting killed and some jewelcraft info. I
have prices for the gems I bought, what they made, how much they sold
for, etc.
http://www.soldbuysam.com/shawn's_place/eq/everquest.asp

Shawn
-----Original Message-----
From: XIII [mailto:dlepriol@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 5:14 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Jewelcrafting - my results


From: XIII <dlepriol@...>

Hello all,


Just a added piece of info regarding selling prices :

at Jewelsmith level 10 Lapis Lazuli necklace goes for 5g 8s 3c
13 // // 6g

Can anyone else confirm price change with quality of work?

Ibnabeth Ench 6/ Karana


At 13:08 19/04/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
>
>I am Kaela, lev 9 enchanter on Tunare. I have a 21 Jewelcrafting
>and Enchant Silver. My charisma is 100, and I did this in my home
>city of Felwithe. Here is what I have accumulated by flushing alot
>of money down the jewel tube:
>
>Prices are rounded to nearest silver.
>
>Gem Buy(Shop) Type Effect
>Sell(Shop)
>Malachite 5s Ring none 5g 8s
>Lapis Lazuli 9s Necklace none 6g 2s
>Turquoise 1g 1s Bracelet none ?
>Cat's Eye Ag 2g 1s ? ? ?
>Onyx 6g 8s Bracelet none 1p 2g
>Jasper 7g 9s Ring none 1p 3g
1s
>Carnelian 8g 9s Wed. Ring none ?
>Rose Quartz 1p 5s Eng. Ring none 1p 5g
7s
>Amber 2p 6g 3s ? ? ?
>Jade 3p 6p 7s Ring +5 Mana 4p 3g
8s
>Topaz 5p 2g 5s Necklace +4 Disease 6p 2s
>
>I'd like to contine compiling this list, and maybe come up with a
>standard price list for selling to players.
>
>Also, I assume the cost of the gem indicates difficulty in making.
>I'd like to know what I should be practicing on. I got overly
>ambitious and threw down alot of money to make the Jade and Topaz
items,
>so I'd like to up my skill before trying any more.
>
>Kaela
